mapper.select: SELECT a.GoodsID GoodsID,a.GoodsName GoodsName,a.MarketPrice MarketPrice ,a.MemberPrice MemberPrice,a.ImageID ImageID,a.ClassID2 ClassID2,b.ImageName ImageName FROM tb_goodsinfo a INNER JOIN tb_image b ON a.ImageID = b.ImageID where a.GoodsID = #{GoodsID}

SELECT b.AttributeName AttributeName,COUNT(a.AttributeValue) AttrSum from tb_attribute a INNER JOIN tb_propertyclass b ON a.AttributeID = b.AttributeID where a.GoodsID = #{GoodsID} GROUP BY a.AttributeID
SELECT Money FROM tb_attribute where GoodsID= #{GoodsID} and Money != 0 and ID = #{ID}
